name: Custom Eyes - Tortoise
description:
Our "Custom Eyes" hinge technology enables interchangeability amongst ALL of our "Custom Eyes" frames & colors!

Created with 100% mirrored UV 400 lens protection, the unique polycarbonate frame design has become an iconic fixture of pop culture fashion. Durably crafted and exceptional in quality and price. It's no secret why Melting Hearts are worn by movie stars, rock stars, athletes and trendsetters around the world. • Handcrafted Frames from Polycarbonate. • Crystal clear Mirrored lenses. • Interchangeable Hinge • Custom metal temple details. • 100% UV 400 lens protection. • Frame measures: 52-42-12-145 Included with purchase: • Microfiber Melting Hearts Pouch. Shipping: All packages shipped within the United States are delivered USPS ground delivery. International shipping rates apply.

name: Neo Straps - Malibu
description:
Melting Hearts straps are designed from durable custom made neoprene fabric with a detailed Melting Hearts screen printed logo on the backside. With custom fit reinforced stitching that only meshes with Melting Hearts shades, these babies were designed for surfing, wakeboarding, volleyball, and every other sport where you might bail and lose your sh*t. An essential accessory to anyone who frequently takes their shades off, to someone who just wants to add some flair to their style.

• 15" long 1" wide 
• High quality neoprene rubber 
• 10" of stretch 
• Silver reflective print 
• Waterproof and buoyant 
• Reinforced stitching 
• Interchangeable with Melting Hearts shades

What is Neoprene? Neoprene is a type of synthetic rubber. Neoprene rubber was developed in the 1930s, and since then has been incorporated into numerous products popular in daily life, from wetsuits to protective gear. Neoprene has a variety of properties that make it quite useful, including being abrasion-resistant, chemical-resistant, waterproof, somewhat stretchable, and buoyant.

Shipping:

All packages shipped within the United States are delivered USPS ground delivery. International shipping rates apply.

name: Classics - Neon Orange
description:
Custom frames with 100% mirrored UV 400 lens protection. The unique polycarbonate frame design has become an iconic fixture of pop culture fashion. Durably crafted and exceptional in quality and price. It's no secret why Melting Hearts are worn by movie stars, rock stars, athletes and trendsetters around the world.

• Handcrafted Frames from Polycarbonate. 
• Crystal clear Mirrored lenses. 
• Durable metal hinges. 
• Custom metal temple details. 
• 100% UV 400 lens protection. 
• Frame measures: 52-42-12-145

Included with purchase:

• Microfiber Melting Hearts Pouch 

Shipping:

All packages shipped within the United States are delivered USPS ground delivery. International shipping rates apply.

description:
